name: Skynix LLC
description:
Skynix was established in 2015 and has been operating worldwide from their cozy office in the beautiful capital of Ukraine, Kyiv. In under a year, our team grew from four to over fifteen tech-thirsty individuals, happy to serve our partners from Oceania, Europe, and the Americas.
Our main focuses are custom Business software development, Magento E-commerce development, and Mobile development.
We are delivering services with a "clean code" feature, that allows us to state and maintain 6 months warranty period for our unique code.
We prefer providing full-cycle development services, but single person outsourcing and part-time support jobs are also delivered on your request.
READ MORE...
